meanings.definition: A formal document outlining the details of a proposed project or business venture.
meanings.sent1: The prospectus for the new company explained all the plans clearly.
meanings.sent2: I picked up a prospectus to learn more about the upcoming project.
meanings.sent3: The prospectus for the school trip made it sound like an exciting adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes scanned the prospectus like a detective searching for clues.
meanings.sent5: The prospectus painted a vivid picture of the future business.

meanings.definition: A brochure or pamphlet providing information about a school, college, or other institution.
meanings.sent1: The school prospectus had colorful pictures of the campus.
meanings.sent2: She grabbed a prospectus to read about the courses offered.
meanings.sent3: The prospectus for the summer camp made it seem like a magical place.
meanings.sent4: The prospectus unfolded like a map to educational opportunities.
meanings.sent5: The prospectus was a window into the world of learning.

meanings.definition: A document describing the major features of a securities offering for potential investors.
meanings.sent1: The prospectus detailed the investment options available.
meanings.sent2: Investors eagerly awaited the release of the company's prospectus.
meanings.sent3: The prospectus for the new stock felt like a golden ticket to wealth.
meanings.sent4: Reading the prospectus was like deciphering a financial puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The prospectus revealed the potential growth of the investment.
